TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Saml2SubjectConfirmationData extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the SubjectConfirmationData element and the associated KeyInfoConfirmationDataType defined in [Saml2Core, 2.4.1.2-2.4.1.3].

remarks.format:
## Remarks The SubjectConfirmationData element is a subelement of the SubjectConfirmation element, which is represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SubjectConfirmation> class.
For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets the network address/location from which an attesting entity can present the assertion. [Saml2Core, 2.4.1.2]
Docs.value: A string that contains the address.
Docs.returns: A string that contains the address.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the ID of a SAML protocol message in response to which an attesting entity can present the assertion. [Saml2Core, 2.4.1.2]
Gets the collection of cryptographic keys that are used in some way to authenticate an attesting entity. [Saml2Core, 2.4.1.3]
Docs.value: Returns a collection of type <xref:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier> that contains the keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The content of a SubjectConfirmationData element that is constrained with the KeyInfoConfirmationDataType. This data type indicates that the element contains cryptographic keys presented in one or more ds:KeyInfo elements.

Docs.returns: Returns a collection of type <xref:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier> that contains the keys.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a time instant before which the subject cannot be confirmed. [Saml2Core, 2.4.1.2]
Docs.value: A nullable <xref:System.DateTime> that contains the time instant in UTC.
Docs.returns: A nullable <xref:System.DateTime> that contains the time instant in UTC.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the time instant at which the subject can no longer be confirmed. [Saml2Core, 2.4.1.2]
Docs.value: A nullable <xref:System.DateTime> that contains the time instant in UTC.
Docs.returns: A nullable <xref:System.DateTime> that contains the time instant in UTC.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a URI that specifies the entity or location to which an attesting entity can present the assertion. [Saml2Core, 2.4.1.2]
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Uri> that specifies the entity or location.
Docs.exception: An attempt to set a value that is not and is not an absolute URI occurs.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.Uri> that specifies the entity or location.
